# SCNHitTestSearchMode

**Enumeration**

Possible values for the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNHitTestOption/searchMode] option used with hit-testing methods.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SCNHitTestSearchMode
```

## Search Modes

- **SCNHitTestSearchMode.all**: The hit test should return all possible results, sorted from nearest to farthest.
- **SCNHitTestSearchMode.any**: The hit test should return only the first object found, regardless of distance.
- **SCNHitTestSearchMode.closest**: The hit test should return only the closes object found.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Options

- **backFaceCulling**: An option to ignore faces not oriented toward the camera.
- **boundingBoxOnly**: An option to search for objects by bounding box only.
- **categoryBitMask**: An option to search only for objects matching a specified bitmask.
- **clipToZRange**: An option to search for objects only within the depth range of the current point of view.
- **ignoreChildNodes**: An option to ignore child nodes when searching.
- **ignoreHiddenNodes**: An option to ignore hidden nodes when searching.
- **rootNode**: The root of the node hierarchy to be searched.
- **searchMode**: An option for the number and order of hit test results to provide.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
